scripts.lighthouse: npm run dev & sleep 3 && lighthouse http://localhost:8080 --view --output html --output-path ./lighthouse-report.html && pkill -f http-server
scripts.lighthouse:index: npm run dev & sleep 3 && lighthouse http://localhost:8080/index.html --view --output html --output-path ./lighthouse-index.html && pkill -f http-server
scripts.lighthouse:photographer: npm run dev & sleep 3 && lighthouse http://localhost:8080/photographer.html?id=243 --view --output html --output-path ./lighthouse-photographer.html && pkill -f http-server
scripts.lighthouse:all: npm run dev & sleep 3 && lighthouse http://localhost:8080/index.html --output html --output-path ./lighthouse-index.html && lighthouse http://localhost:8080/photographer.html?id=243 --output html --output-path ./lighthouse-photographer.html && pkill -f http-server
scripts.minify: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js && npm run minify:html
